tool_description: Provides quotes , Everyone need inspiration in life at some point of the life. Here we came up with API's which provides operations on Quotes .
title: QuotesForYou

api_list.name: GetQuote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotesforyou.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotesforyou.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
